article.title: SAIC Awarded $12 Million Contract From Air Force Weather Agency
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC) has been awarded a delivery order under the U.S. Strategic Command Systems and Mission Support II prime contract managed by the 55th Contracting Squadron. This delivery order is to provide advisory and assistance services to the U.S. Air Force Weather Agency for life-cycle program management support. The delivery order has a total value of more than $12 million if all options are exercised.
